sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog
            :value="visible"
            width="500"
            persistent
    >
        <v-card>
            <v-card-title
                    class="headline grey lighten-2"
                    primary-title
            >
                Pick a channel
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn icon flat @click="cancel">
                    <v-icon>close</v-icon>
                </v-btn>
            </v-card-title>

            <v-card-text>
                <v-select :loading="!pubChannelsList" v-model="channelId" :items="pubChannelsList"></v-select>
            </v-card-text>

            <v-divider></v-divider>

            <v-card-actions>
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn
                        color="primary"
                        flat
                        @click="pick"
                >
                    Connect
                </v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>
    import {mapActions, mapGetters} from 'vuex';

    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                channelId      : null,
                pubChannelsList: null
            }
        },
        props  : {
            visible: {
                type   : Boolean,
                default: false
            }
        },
        methods: {
            ...mapActions({
                getPublicChannelsList: 'Socket/getPublicChannelsList'
            }),
            pick() {
                this.$emit('select', this.channelId);
            },
            cancel() {
                this.$emit('cancel');
            }
        },
        computed: {
            ...mapGetters({
                profile: 'Socket/profile'
            })
        },
        watch  : {
            async visible(newValue) {
                if (!newValue) {
                    return;
                }
                this.channelId = null;
                let data = await this.getPublicChannelsList(1, 20);
                console.log('Got pub channels list', data);
                this.pubChannelsList = data.rows
                    .filter((item) => {
                        return !this.profile.memberOf.includes(item.id)
                    })
                    .map(item => {
                        return {
                            'text' : item.meta.name,
                            'value': item.id,
                        }
                    })
            }
        }
    }
</script>
